channel.title: Authors on Akash Jindal
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Akash Jindal

item.description:
Akash Jindal is an Associate Consultant in Infosys Ltd. His past experience include AR(Augmented Reality) developement, Springboot Backend, Azure based Publising and Subscription Service etc. He is currently part of an assignment with World’s Leading Gaming and Interactive Entertainment Client where he is part of requirement gathering, Quality Assurance, Automation etc.

With experience in various fields, Akash Jindal has been awarded on various achivements, be it big or small.
